text_block_list.text: Brian's making some amazing<n>progress at summer camp.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... huff...

She's running along the beach alone,<n>using her drive to race
as fuel to push<n>forward. But...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Phew... That's the morningroutine done.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The afternoon will be free practice as<n>planned... Hm?

Summer camp should be a special<n>opportunity for her to
race against<n>others too. I wonder who—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer. Get your head in the<n>game.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I know.

I decide to find a practice partner right<n>away so we can
make the most out of<n>this training camp.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hm... Is that my trainer? What's<n>going on over there?

text_block_list.name: Bun-haired Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
A scrimmage against Narita Brian?!<n>Absolutely not! I can
already picture<n>my humiliating defeat!
choice_data_list: Come on—no one wins 'em all, right?
Come on—no one wins 'em all, right?

text_block_list.name: Bun-haired Umamusume
text_block_list.text: W-well, sure, but still... Umm, geez... I<n>dunno...

text_block_list.name: Blue-ribboned Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, I'd need to build up my<n>skills first before racing
Brian. It'd be<n>rude to waste her time.
choice_data_list: I'm sure you'd both get a lot out of it!
I'm sure you'd both get a lot out of it!

text_block_list.name: Blue-ribboned Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I hear what you're saying, and<n>maybe I'm just making
excuses... But<n>sorry, I'll need to think about it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...What's the deal? Why are you<n>trying so hard?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(Thinking back, that stubbornness<n>was the same when we
first met. It<n>never mattered how dismissive I<n>was...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Are you... trying to share my hunger<n>for racing? This...
painful burden of<n>mine?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I guess that's just who my trainer is.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Heh... Thinking about it like that,<n>maybe we're both looking
for some<n>extra fire to keep us burning.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(After all, it was you who gave me<n>this chance. You got my
passion for<n>running to thrive again.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
My desire is still strong. It only gets<n>stronger the more I run.
And yet...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It feels nostalgic too... Like something<n>I thought I'd lost...

In my frantic search for a practice<n>opponent, I don't even
realize it's<n>gotten dark out.

In the end, not one person would<n>accept, and I'm left
empty-handed.
choice_data_list: I couldn't do a thing for her...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
It's summer, but the breeze gets<n>chilly at night. You'll catch
a cold out<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I know what you've been up to all<n>day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry about it. Plenty of<n>opponents will be waiting
back at the<n>academy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I did find something, though. In allmy craving for a challenge, I realized Ihad hope too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I think maybe you taught me that. So,<n>well...

She's not one to hesitate when she<n>talks. Could this mean
she's... trying<n>to cheer me up?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You know...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Good. Let's get back.

While we walk back, Brian is almost<n>acting shy. And though
it's faint, she<n>even smiles a bit, like a little kid.

I step outside the next morning and<n>see something
unbelievable.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...What?

text_block_list.name: Blue-ribboned Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I thought about it, and I'd like to at<n>least give it a try. A
chance like this<n>doesn't come often after all.

text_block_list.name: Bun-haired Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
And it's important to get a real sense<n>for where you're at!
So, like...

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: You're on, Narita Brian!

Lined up outside the dorms is a<n>crowd of all the runners I'd
asked<n>yesterday to race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Pfft, haha! I guess drive is contagious.<n>I can see you're all
burning with it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
But it's the same for me... All right. I'll<n>take each and every
one of you on!

text_block_list.name: Blue-ribboned Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hey, Brian?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Blue-ribboned Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You've found yourself a great trainer.<n>Honestly, I'm
jealous.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh... Damn straight.

Waves crash amid the thunderous<n>footsteps of the fired up
racers. The<n>sound of it leaves me in awe.
